de.adesso.termacare.service

Class MedicationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adesso.termacare.service.MedicationService

  • public class MedicationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for querying for/by medications or modifying medications

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MedicationService getInstance()

      • getMedications

        public java.util.List<Medication> getMedications()
        load all medications from the database
        Returns:
        list of all medications

      • createMedication

        public void createMedication(long id,
                             Patient patient,
                             java.util.List<Doctor> doctors,
                             MedicationType type,
                             java.time.LocalDateTime appointment)
        Save or update the data for a medication If the given id is zero a new medication is created
        Parameters:
        id - id of the medication to update or 0 to create new medication
        patient - Patient which the medication is for
        doctors - Doctors that are present for the medication
        type - type of the medication
        appointment - time and date of the medication
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there already is a medication in that timeslot

      • getMedications

        public java.util.List<Medication> getMedications(long patientId)
        Get all medications - future or past - for a given patient
        Parameters:
        patientId - patient to search for
        Returns:
        list of patients medications

      • deleteMedication

        public void deleteMedication(long medicationId)
        Remove a medication by it's id
        Parameters:
        medicationId - medication to delete

      • reschedule

        public void reschedule(long medicationId,
                       java.time.LocalDateTime appointment)
        move a medications appointment
        Parameters:
        medicationId - medication to move
        appointment - new appointment details
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the medication does not exist
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there already is another medication in the same timeslot

      • timeSlotFree

        private boolean timeSlotFree(java.time.LocalDateTime appointment)
        Check if a given time slot is unused as of now
        Parameters:
        appointment - appointment to check
        Returns:
        true if slot is free, false otherwise

      • intersects

        private boolean intersects(java.time.LocalDateTime time1,
                           java.time.LocalDateTime time2)
        Check if two times are within one hour of each other
        Parameters:
        time1 - time to check collision for
        time2 - time to check collision with
        Returns:
        true if times intersect, false otherwise
